item.title: Book Review: The Design of Web APIs
item.description: Title: The Design of Web APIs ISBN: 9781617295102 Publisher: Manning WWW: https://www.manning.com/books/the-design-of-web-apis Pages: 389 I recently had a chance to read “The Design of Web APIs” from Manning Publishing. The book is inspired by “The Design of Everyday Things”, the legendary writing of Donald Norman, that I still own as an original hard-copy printed in 1990. I like this masterpiece not because I studied Donald Norman quite a lot during my PhD studies (especially during the Human-Computer Interaction course), but also it’s still very relevant writing.
